
## Chunks

### Code chunk with output

```{r demo-chunk, error=TRUE}
# nonsense function to demo code style

func_var <- function(arg = FALSE) {
  string_var <- "I'm a string"
  int_var <- 1L
  dbl_var <- -3.165 * int_var
  bool_var <- TRUE
  vector_var <- 1:5
  
  paste(string_var, int_var, sep = " - ")
}

func_var()
as.numeric("A")
rnorm("A")
```
